headline: Motorola Solutions Record Results Refocus Investor Attention On Public Safety Growth
summary: Motorola Solutions reported record revenue, earnings, operating margins, and cash flow, alongside a record order backlog. The company secured major long term contracts across public safety and defense, reinforcing demand visibility. Recent acquisitions of Silvus and Blue Eye expanded AI powered video and defense technology capabilities. New FedRAMP authorization was granted for the SVX body worn assistant and CommandCentral DEMS cloud solutions for law enforcement. Motorola Solutions...
